Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Gryphon', 3: 'Sarge, can we break radio silence yet?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gryphon', 3: "You said so the last time I asked! And where's Castien?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The radio had died along with Castien.'}
{3: "Gryphon's question is meaningless. Bexonidas just doesn't have the heart to tell him."}
{3: "A tiny squad running a diversion against a horde that size... Without cover, the result was anyone's guess."}
{3: 'After an hour-long intense battle, the ten-man squad is down to three.'}
{3: "Except Halan sacrificed himself in an explosion to cover Bexonidas and Gryphon's escape."}
{3: "Which means that the two of them are all that's left."}
{3: 'The two are crouched in a shallow foxhole, firing from behind a beat-up vehicle.'}
{3: "Except they won't even be able to keep up the fire for long, as all they have left are three magazines."}
{3: '...As long as they hold out until Watanabe and his "guests" finish the job, the tide might just turn.'}
